value:
$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Wow, look at the ocean! It's so big!
Big enough for all my friends to play
in, all at the same time!$k$p$WmMPID_水着タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Swim18,Face|It sure is. Blue waters, blue skies... A
perfect day.$k$pI hope we can be freed from this
annoying contract soon. I came here
to go swimming, after all.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|We have to fall back and regroup with
the others! Oh, but... Where did we
say we'll meet up again?$k$p$WmMPID_水着タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Swim18,Face|Oh, what am I going to do with you...
Come on, follow me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|Thanks, Tak-Tak!$k$p$Sbs150|
